name: techhelp4u
description: Technical Help Volunteer Platform - עזרה טכנית בהתנדבות

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npm run db:generate && npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && rm -f dev.db && npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist && rm -rf frontend/dist && rm -rf backend/node_modules && rm -rf frontend/node_modules && rm -rf node_modules

author: Tech Help Volunteers
